mapper.select: SELECT tpb.id, tp.title, tpb.thumbnail, tpb.title AS track_project_name, tt.id AS track_team_id FROM track_team_member ttm JOIN track_team tt ON ttm.track_team_id = tt.id JOIN track_project tp ON tt.track_project_id = tp.id JOIN track_project_board tpb ON tt.id = tpb.track_team_id WHERE ttm.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY tp.created_at DESC;
SELECT u.id, u.name, ttm.role FROM track_team_member ttm JOIN user u ON ttm.user_id = u.id WHERE ttm.track_team_id = #{trackTeamId}

SELECT fpb.id AS finaleProjectBoardId, fpb.title AS title, fpb.created_at AS createdAt FROM finale_team_member ftm JOIN finale_project_board fpb ON ftm.finale_team_id = fpb.finale_team_id WHERE ftm.user_id = #{userId} AND fpb.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY fpb.created_at DESC

SELECT s.title AS solutionTitle, s.id AS solutionId, s.runtime AS runtime, s.memory AS memory, s.language_id AS languageId, p.title AS problemTitle
FROM algorithm_problem_solution s JOIN algorithm_problem p ON s.problem_id = p.id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.is_deleted = FALSE AND p.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
